title: White Sherwani, Blue Lehenga
description: Amidst the grandeur of a lavish wedding, Vaishali figures out a secret that leaves her both shocked and uncomfortable. Caught in a weird dilemma, she only has a few minutes to decide what is the right course of action. What decision should she make, and does she even know what the truth really is?***Editor's Pick of the Week (2019 Juggernaut Books)***Give it a read on the Juggernaut website & app!
author: Granthana Sinha
